snippet.title: Karagon Announcement Trailer [OLD]
snippet.description:
NEW TRAILER: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YEzpi9eW198
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1818610/Karagon/
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/f4m8NQ2kP8
Survive and shoot killer robots then reuse their parts to construct your own rideable robots! Build your base, gather resources, craft and forge weapons and machines. Shoot, construct, and ride the most massive robots in this post apocalyptic open world survival game!
